sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Async FastAPI service exposing REST endpoints with OpenAPI and strong typing.

sections.title: Data Model
sections.content: User, Subscription, Invoice, WebhookEvent with relationships; Alembic migrations.

sections.title: Example Endpoints
sections.content: POST /v1/subscriptions; GET /v1/invoices; POST /v1/webhooks/stripe. Include Pydantic models and examples.

sections.title: SLOs & Alerts
sections.content: p95 < 150ms; uptime 99.9%; alerts for latency and DB error rates.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: JWT validation, RBAC, parameterized SQL, secret management, per-key rate limits.
